name: Sweet Thieves
description:
Play as hungry chameleons in a terrarium and compete against your friends to capture the most pancakes before time runs out!

CONTROLS:

Xbox Controller

Right Trigger - Tongue Lash

A - Select on menu

Left joystick - Player movement (also navigate menus)

Right joystick - Player aiming

Credits:
